title: T is for...
description: Life isn’t easy if you’re the teenage daughter of an army general. Moving from one continent to another helped me learn 4 different languages in record time, but it also killed my social life. And when this cute guy in my new hometown gives me hell just because he thinks he knows me, the prospect of the coming school year makes me want to call it quits. For some strange reason, however, I can’t stop daydreaming about this impossible guy. And boy, he can kiss! Even outside my dreams…
author: Piper Shelly
